name: energy-powder
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores 50 HP. Decreases happiness by 5/5/10.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A very bitter medicinal powder. When consumed, it restores up to 60 HP to an injured Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A very bitter medicinal powder. When consumed, it restores up to 60 HP to an injured Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A very bitter medicinal powder. When consumed, it restores up to 60 HP to an injured Pokémon.
